author: dominoboy
description:
Each button makes you (the red line) move slower or faster. Depending on the widgets, you need to see where the racers are at a certain section, the expert must quickly recall what the defuser should do then on. The manual should explain everything else.

If there's anything that is confusing/may not be possible, please say what is wrong I'll we can sort out a plan B.
name: Race
notes: Author may be difficult to contact, please check 'Old Manual Spreadsheet' if you want better contact details.
